greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Möbius transform of A003959.
comment: a(n) = n for squarefree n; otherwise, a(n) > n. - _Ivan Neretin_, May 13 2015
Dirichlet inverse of A062953. - _Werner Schulte_, Oct 25 2018
link: Ivan Neretin, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: Multiplicative with a(p^e) = p(p+1)^(e-1). - _David W. Wilson_, Sep 01 2001
mathematica: Table[{pp, aa} = Transpose[FactorInteger[n]]; Times @@ (pp*(pp + 1)^(aa - 1)), {n, 70}]  (* _Ivan Neretin_, May 13 2015 *)
program: (PARI) a(n) = {my(f=factor(n)); for (i=1, #f~, p= f[i, 1]; f[i, 1] = p*(p+1)^(f[i,2]-1); f[i, 2] = 1); factorback(f);} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Feb 26 2015
results.author: _Marc LeBrun_
ext: More terms from _David W. Wilson_, Aug 29 2001
